name: Unrefined Stone
description: Weak stone taken straight from the ground.

name: Refined Stone
description: Stone that has been refined into a stronger form.

name: Dull Wood Stick
description: A practically useless stick. Do you really want this?

name: Vine
description: A vine. Naturally bendy!

name: Dinosaur Leg
description: Mmm... tasty! Wait, is this safe to eat?

name: Beach Rock
description: Some weak rocks found on the beach. Useful for crafting.

name: Drift Wood
description: Weak sticks washed ashore from old trees. Useful for crafting.

name: Log
description: Large logs perfect for burning.

name: Lighter
description: It makes fire!

name: Campfire
description: The crowning achievement of man: Fire!

name: Berry
description: Random berry for eating, don't know the effects though.

name: Raft
description: The thing you have been waiting for. ESCAPE NOW!

name: Onion
description: While smelly, onions make for a decent source of nutrition.

name: Dinosaur Bone
description: A bone from a real dinosaur. Useful for weapon crafting.

name: Meteor
description: A mysterious glowing rock that has fallen from the sky.

name: Flint
description: A rock that produces sparks when struck with a hard material.

name: Sharpened Wood Stick
description: A sharp stick probably useful for stabbing things with.

name: Reinforced Wood Rod
description: A reinforced stick probably useful for building things with.

name: Rope
description: A rope useful for many purposes.

name: Reinforced Rope
description: A reinforced rope useful for only the sturdiest purposes.

name: Shaped Plank
description: A shaped wood plank. Perhaps useful as part of a paddle?

name: Sandstone
description: A rough stone composed of sand.

name: Coconut
description: A delicious snack that falls from trees.

name: Raft Paddle
description: A useful tool for paddling through water in a raft.

name: Raft Support
description: A raft support structure, crafted from reinforced wood.

name: Raft Plank
description: A plank used to construct the exterior of the raft.
